list_page_teaser: Valerie & Ryan have been going together for over ten years.  Click and maybe you can learn how they make their relationship last!
description_html:
Valerie and Ryan are part of Denver's Art community and have been in a relationship for over ten years.

Hopefully they will share some of their tips for how they make their relationship last. Check back soon for updates!
story_html:
I met Valerie and Ryan at the Goth clubs in Denver.

Since deciding to move forward with this site, I have not been going out much. I wanted to have something for them to look at before asking them to share their story.

I apologize for not yet having the tips hinted at in the teaser on the gallery page. Please be patient — this sort of work takes a long time! I work every day, but do everything myself, and I am not yet making any money off it!

Come out to the Milk Bar sometime and maybe you will meet us on person. To learn when I update the site, follow us on social media or join the email list!

image_list.title: Valerie
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: The Blue and Red in Valerie's spiritual portrait say she is idealistic and passionate.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Blue in this portrait represents Valeries's dominant trait, her idealism.  In Extraverts, the dominant trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this, because it is the side of their personality that is most evident.
image_list.explain_aux: The Red in this portrait represents Valeries's auxiliary trait, her passion.  In Extraverts, the auxiliary trait is directed inwardly and is less evident than the dominant trait.

image_list.title: Ryan
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: The Green and Blue in Ryan's spiritual portrait say he is rational and idealistic.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Green in this portrait represents Ryan's dominant trait, his rationality.  In Introverts, the dominant trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long horizontal line to represent this.
image_list.explain_aux: The Blue in this portrait represents Ryan's auxiliary trait, his idealism.  In Introverts, the auxiliary trait is directed outwardly and is more evident than the dominant trait.
